title: MCP Etherscan Server
text_for_llm: Description: An MCP (Model Context Protocol) server that provides Ethereum blockchain data tools via Etherscan's API. Features include checking ETH balances, viewing transaction history, tracking ERC20 transfers, fetching contract ABIs, monitoring gas prices, and resolving ENS names. Use cases: Checking the ETH balance of any Ethereum address. Viewing transaction history for auditing or tracking purposes. Monitoring gas prices for transaction optimization. Fetching contract ABIs for developers working with smart contracts. Resolving ENS names for user-friendly Ethereum address representation.

title: MCP Client

Looking up definitions and synonyms using the Dictionary client. Performing web and image searches through the Google Search client. Managing cache with the LRU Cache client for efficient data retrieval.
